contest-event.event-date:
June 3, 2018 D Kantonal Musikfest Vaud/Waadt (Défilé/Marschmusik)
Kantonal Musikfest Vaud/Waadt (Défilé/Marschmusik) 100 March Contest Kantonal Musikfest Vaud/Waadt kantonal-musikfest-vaud-waadt-defile
None Switzerland
Vallée de Joux, VD, Switzerland > held on June 2nd & 3rd
40 Bands (mixed Brass/Wind but sep. Category CS/1st on Saturday and 2nd/3rd on Sat & Sun; 3rd Section Brass Band all on Saturday).
Pls forward missing Conductors and Marches played.
March 19, 2017, 6:53 p.m. June 18, 2020, 1:49 p.m.
1 Fanfare L'Espérance Chevenez Rainier Chételat
1 Fanfare Paroissiale Ursy Serge Gros

3 Echo des Rochers Puidoux Antoine Rabut
3 Fanfare de Gland Unknown

6 La Montagnarde Château-d'Oex Unknown
8 Corps de Musique Pully Stéphane Pecorini
